ad_text: HCA TriStar Division Careers Sponsored TriStar Skyline Medical Center celebrates our incredible nurses who are making a difference in our hospital every day, serving with compassion and skill, shining bright as they care for their patients and one another. We’re putting the spotlight on some of these nursing stars, letting them share with you how they have unlocked their career potential with HCA Healthcare and TriStar Health, and why they love what they do. Learn more about registered nurse Amy Higgins, chief nursing officer at TriStar Skyline, and how you, too, can reach your personal and professional goals with us! #ShiningTriSTARS #HCAcareers #UnlockPossibilities CAREERS.HCAHEALTHCARE.COM Learn More

HCA TriStar Division Careers Sponsored TriStar Greenview Regional Hospital is hosting a Walk-In Wednesday hiring event on February 1, from 2 p.m. to 5 p.m. We are focused on growing careers in our Emergency Services department and medical/surgical units, including orthopedics, telemetry and our cardiac specialty programs. We will be completing on-the-spot interviews for all nursing and support roles around the hospital as well. This is an exciting opportunity to meet with our hiring team and embark on a new career path in the new year. #HCAcareers #UnlockPossibilities #HiringEvent CAREEREVENTS.HCAHEALTHCARE.COM Sign Up
